infos.value: Grrraaah...!
W-we did it...!
It was faster and of a strength greater than regular malboro...but nonetheless, it paled against us.
I wonder how Rain and Fina have fared.
Those two... I think they've both been through many great battles.
I could see an unwavering trust and confidence in both their eyes.
They're strong... I am sure they will prevail.
You are right... I am sure their malboro lays defeated.
Let us make haste and rejoin them.
Gu... Gi-giii...
...What?
Grrraaah!!
Watch out, Machérie!
It still drew life! You have my thanks, Mont.
Grrrah...! Grrraaahhh!!
What!? It fled!?
Let's give chase, Machérie!
Mont! Machérie! Are you guys all right?
Rain! All is well with us. I'm glad you both are safe.
The malboro we thought slain rose again only to flee. We pursued it this far...
The same thing happened to us! It suddenly started thrashing about.
It is almost as if they fled to be reunited...
Grrraaah! Grrraaah!
Attacking as a pair changes naught! We slay them for good this time!
There's no way out of this one! You're toast!
Gu... Gi-giii...
They're not attacking...? Something is amiss!
Grrraaahhh!!
Huh!? That malboro just...
Ate the other one...!?
Gu... Gu... Grrraaaaaah!!
I-it can't be...! It grows stronger by feeding on its own kind!?
Get ready! It's coming for us!
